TopicTitle: Fuel tank L/O disable/enable flow in custom actions

Articles.Content: Please add possibility to disable/enable fuel flow on particular fuel tanks using a custom action
I second this idea, would be a great addition
I will give a bump to this.  I would like this as well.

I agree too. This would be a small but game-changing addition.

Fire

Uh, guys? All you have to do is right-click on a fuel tank and click that tiny button to the right of the fuel gauge. Green means fuel flow is enabled, and red means no fuel crossfeed. But I guess an action group would be convenient.
